dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile shows areas containing a concentration of buildings and other structures in Burkina Faso. The Global Map Burkina Faso version 2 was developed based on Global Map Specifications version 2.1. The data source was a 1:200,000 paper map made in 1960, which was converted to digital format and updated in 2000 and 2009.Global Map data were developed under the cooperation of National Geospatial Information Authorities (NGIAs) of respective countries and regions.
dc_publisher_s: International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
dc_creator_sm: International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
